mention: The Gamarue base uses several anti-analysis methods to avoid being run in a sandbox.
context_left: If multiple attempts were made to run a sample in a sandbox with the same volume serial number, the registration would fail and no further modules would be downloaded.
context_right: However, the anti-analysis functionality can be bypassed by creating a registry key under “HKEY\_LOCAL\_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies” named “is\_not\_vm” with the value as the volume serial number as a 32-bit hexadecimal number.
